links.title: Cramer: We could be facing a cold war with China, and these stocks may be sacrificed
links.description: Recent swings in the stock market don't make it an easy environment for individual investors, CNBC's Jim Cramer admitted as fears tied to earnings and geopolitical tensions drove many stocks lower on Monday. "Those losses are substantial if you own anything connected to housing or to China, two problems that I regard as entirely man-made," the "Mad Money" host said.
